description: A React functional component named 'Controls' that renders game status, reset button, and move history for a tic-tac-toe game. It accepts props for game status, reset function, move history, current move index, and jump-to move function.

methods.name: Controls({ status, onReset, history = [], currentStep, onJumpTo })
methods.description: React component rendering game controls, including status display, reset button, and move history list with jump-to move buttons.

ctags.name: Controls
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Controls({ status, onReset, history = [], currentStep, onJumpTo }) {$/
